snippet: A witness said the gunfire had been aimed at the crowd as an opening act was performing at S.O.B.’s.
abstract: Unidentified gunman opens fire at SoHo music club, S.O.B.s, wounding four men; police are searching for the suspect, who fled the scene amid the rush of people trying to get out of the club.
lead_paragraph: A witness said the gunfire had been aimed at the crowd as an opening act was performing at S.O.B.’s.

headline.main: Four in Audience Are Shot at a Club in SoHo
headline.print_headline: Four in Audience Are Shot at a Club in SoHo
